scenario_text.value: GRAAAAAAAAAWR!!!

What’s going on?! Our attacks aren’t working
at all!
And he’s pushing us back!

I can’t take this... Why did things have to
turn out this way?
We’re all friends... Why do we have to fight?

(This is bad... Our spirits will give out
before our bodies do!)
(We have to turn this around somehow!)
UWOOOOOOOOOH! GRRRAAAAAAGH!
Listen, Takuma! He’s crying!
Is he...crying?!
Takuma... Listen, Takuma! He’s crying!

Listen closely... Can you hear it? That
thing’s crying!
Crying...?

IT HURRRTS... I’M SCAAARED... I DON’T WANNA
DO THIIIS...
It’s Lopmon! Lopmon’s crying!
Lopmon! Lopmon’s crying!
Lopmon... Lopmon’s crying!
That’s Lopmon! Lopmon’s...crying?!

WHY...WAS I IGNORED?
WHAT SHOULD I HAVE DONE...?
That’s... No way, is that Shuuji’s voice?!

I DON’T HAVE...ANY REASON TO LIVE.
I SHOULD JUST DISAPPEAR...
That’s not true! It’s good that you exist!
That’s not true! You deserve to exist!

Did Shuuji really think that...? If so, then
we...

We put him into a leadership role due to his
age, and made everything his responsibility.

He was suffering the whole time...and we were
the ones who made him suffer!

Let’s go, Takuma! We should save those two
ourselves!
Let’s go, Takuma! We gotta save those two!

Let’s go, Takuma... We should save those two
with our own power!

Let’s do this, Takuma! We’ll save the two of
them!

Yeah...yeah, you’re right. We have to end
this with our own strength!

We have to convey our feelings to those two.
We’ll need even more strength to get through!

...Your heart’s giving me power, Takuma.
Your strong feelings towards those two!

Agh...!!! Ah... Takuma... It’s happening
again...!
Agumon? It can’t be...?!
Ahh... I...I...! Uwooooooh!
That form...are you...?!

Now our feelings will reach them.
Come on, Takuma! Let’s do it!

There’s so much we need to say to them, but
we’re not strong enough to get through...

I want... I want strength. Strength to make
our words reach them!

Whoa...!!! I I, think we’re about to see that
strength!

Your feelings are filling me with power...!
Ah...ahhh...!
Agumon...?!

Here I go, Takuma... It’s time to show them
what we’re made of! Uwooooooh!
Uwooooooh!
That form... Are you...?!

Now our words should reach their hearts.
Let’s do it, Takuma!

We’ll take all of Shuuji’s regret and anger,
and slam it into the jerk that ate him!
Oh! This feeling...!!!
Yeah... I get it!

I want more power. Power to express those
feelings, to vent that anger!
Got it... Takuma! Uwooooooh!
You... Yeah, okay! Let’s give it all we got!

Let’s go, Takuma! We have the power to save
them!
